fields.contact_about_text_en:
{"delta": "{\"ops\":[{\"insert\":\"If you have any questions, suggestions or wishes, you can always contact us through the feedback form or by phone.\\n\\nWe consider each complaint individually and constantly monitor the quality of our products. You can leave your comments on the website, by phone numbers or in Direct Instagram.\\n\"}]}", "html": "

If you have any questions, suggestions or wishes, you can always contact us through the feedback form or by phone.


We consider each complaint individually and constantly monitor the quality of our products. You can leave your comments on the website, by phone numbers or in Direct Instagram.

"}
fields.welcome_text_en:
{"delta": "{\"ops\":[{\"insert\":\"Pizza Kharkiv will delight you with a large amount of filling and a huge layer of cheese on top. In the modern world with a crazy pace of life, pizza delivery in Kharkiv has become very popular. The family pizzeria Pikes Peak Pizza offers 24-hour pizza delivery in Kharkiv. 24-hour pizza delivery in Kharkiv works all year round, at any time of the day or night, in any weather. We will deliver your favorite pizza anywhere in the city. You will receive a ready-made dish of your choice quickly, within 60 minutes. Our pizzas are prepared by specially trained chefs, using only fresh products, using old recipes and the latest cooking technologies.\\n\"}]}", "html": "

Pizza Kharkiv will delight you with a large amount of filling and a huge layer of cheese on top. In the modern world with a crazy pace of life, pizza delivery in Kharkiv has become very popular. The family pizzeria Pikes Peak Pizza offers 24-hour pizza delivery in Kharkiv. 24-hour pizza delivery in Kharkiv works all year round, at any time of the day or night, in any weather. We will deliver your favorite pizza anywhere in the city. You will receive a ready-made dish of your choice quickly, within 60 minutes. Our pizzas are prepared by specially trained chefs, using only fresh products, using old recipes and the latest cooking technologies.

"}
fields.working_time_text_en: we work seven days a week

fields.title: Burger Combo
fields.description:
Бургер класичний - 1 шт (булка пшеничне, соус барбекю, мікс салату, цибуля ялтинський солодкий, помідор, пивні огірки, котлета з телятини, соус гірчичний). Вага: 360 грам
Бургер Чіз Бекон - 1 шт (булка пшеничне, соус барбекю, мікс салату, цибуля ялтинський солодкий, помідор, котлета з телятини, сир чеддер, пивні огірки, бекон, соус гірчичний). Вага: 360 грам
Картопля фрі по 150 грам - 2 порції
Соус кетчуп 1шт - 50 грам
Соус сирний 1шт - 50 грам
Креветка тигрова - 60 грам / 3шт.
Смажений сир Моцарелла - 100 грам.
Салат Коул Слоу - 70 грам
Pepsi - 1л

Бургер классический  — 1 шт (булка пшеничная, соус барбекю, микс салата, лук ялтинский сладкий, помидор, пивные огурцы, котлета из телятины, соус горчичный).  Вес: 360 грамм
Бургер Чиз Бекон  — 1 шт (булка пшеничная, соус барбекю, микс салата, лук ялтинский сладкий, помидор, котлета из телятины, сыр чеддер, пивные огурцы, бекон, соус горчичный). Вес: 360 грамм
Картофель фри по 150 грамм —  2 порции
Соус кетчуп 1шт — 50 грамм
Соус сырный 1шт — 50 грамм
Креветка тигровая — 60 грамм/3шт.
Жаренный сыр Моцарелла — 100 грамм.
Салат Коул Слоу — 70 грамм
Pepsi — 1л
fields.description_en:
Classic burger - 1 pc (wheat loaf, barbecue sauce, salad mix, sweet Yalta onion, tomato, beer cucumbers, veal cutlet, mustard sauce). Weight: 360 grams
Burger Cheese Bacon - 1 pc (wheat bun, barbecue sauce, salad mix, sweet Yalta onion, tomato, veal cutlet, cheddar cheese, beer cucumbers, bacon, mustard sauce). Weight: 360 grams
French fries 150 grams each - 2 servings
Ketchup sauce 1pc - 50 grams
Cheese sauce 1pc - 50 grams
Tiger shrimp - 60 grams / 3pcs.
Fried Mozzarella cheese - 100 grams.
Cole Slow Salad - 70 grams
Pepsi - 1L
